comments:
Build ID: I20070601-1539

Steps To Reproduce:
I've converted some 3.1.2 projects to CDT 4.0.0 RC3 and then tried to rebuild them (proprietary tool-chain). I get the following assertion on some headers (which I cannot easily provide). Those headers all look the same:

#ifndef FOO
  #ifdef __GNUC__
     #warning "..."
  #else
     #pragma message("...")
  #endif
#endif

#ifdef BAR
#include <a/b.h>
#endif


Could the indexer be confused by "#pragma message ()" ?

I can do some debugging if needed.
